title: Game Scoop Episode 639
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Seth Macy, and Justin Davis -- are discussing Outriders' sales (or lack thereof), pixel art, memories of old game stores, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
